block.p: FRIEDMAN-Henry. The gentlest of men. On September 16, 2000. Captain U.S. Army, WWII, a graduate of City College, Mr. Friedman had maintained a CPA practice for over thirty-five years and was also Head Counselor at Surprise Lake Camp during the mid-1930s. Devoted husband of the late Doris; loving father of Carol Siegel, Peter and Mark; father-inlaw of Arthur Siegel and Joan Allen; dear brother of Herbert and sisters-in-law Sylvia and Evelyne; cherished grandfather of Benjamin, Jocelyn, Daniel and Sadie. Services Tuesday, 10 AM, at Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapels, 114-03 Queens Blvd at 76th Road, Forest Hills.

Devoted husband of the late Doris; loving father of Carol Siegel, Peter and Mark; father-inlaw of Arthur Siegel and Joan Allen; dear brother of Herbert and sisters-in-law Sylvia and Evelyne; cherished grandfather of Benjamin, Jocelyn, Daniel and Sadie. Services Tuesday, 10 AM, at Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapels, 114-03 Queens Blvd at 76th Road, Forest Hills.
